SELECT G_IDX, G_BARCODE, GGT_IDX, G_PO_IDX FROM GOODS, GOODS_TEMP, GOODS_GROUP_TEMP WHERE GT_GGT_IDX = GGT_IDX AND GT_G_IDX = G_IDX AND GGT_IDX = #{ggt_idx} ORDER BY GT_CREATED_DATETIME DESC

SELECT * FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY ON P_CATE_IDX = CATE_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_RECEIVED ON G_POR_IDX = POR_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_PRODUCT ON POR_PP_IDX = PP_IDX LEFT JOIN CHECK_GOODS ON G_IDX = CGS_G_IDX LEFT JOIN CHECK_GROUP ON CGS_CG_IDX = CG_IDX WHERE G_IDX = #{gIdx} AND CG_IDX = #{cgIdx}

SELECT G_IDX, G_BARCODE, P_NAME, IG_IDX, G_STATE, P_IDX, G_JSON, G_OPTION, PP_JSON, G_IMEI, G_RANK, G_MEMO, G_VENDOR, CATE_SPEC_LIST, P_OPTION, G_JSON ->> '$.inSpec2' AS INSPEC2, G_JSON ->> '$.sellSpec2' AS SELLSPEC2, (SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.pSpec1' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PSPEC1, (SELECT PN_IDX FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PAINT' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAINT_PN_IDX, (SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.paintContent' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PAINT' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAINT_CONTENT, @PAINT_COST:=IFNULL((SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.paintCost' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PAINT' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1),0) AS PAINT_COST, (SELECT PN_PROCESS FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PAINT' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAINT_PROCESS, (SELECT PN_IDX FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'FIX' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS FIX_PN_IDX, (SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.fixContent' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'FIX' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS FIX_CONTENT, @FIX_COST:=IFNULL((SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.fixCost' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'FIX' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1),0) AS FIX_COST, (SELECT PN_PROCESS FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'FIX' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS FIX_PROCESS,
(SELECT PN_IDX FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PROCESS_PN_IDX, (SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.processContent' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PROCESS_CONTENT, @PROCESS_COST:=IFNULL((SELECT PN_JSON ->> '$.processCost' FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1),0) AS PROCESS_COST, (SELECT PN_PROCESS FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1) AS PROCESS_PROCESS,
IFNULL((SELECT PN_JSON FROM PROCESS_NEED WHERE PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND G_IDX = PN_G_IDX ORDER BY PN_IDX DESC LIMIT 1), '{}') AS PN_JSON FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_PRODUCT ON PO_IDX = PP_PO_IDX LEFT JOIN IN_GROUP ON PO_IDX = IG_PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY ON P_CATE_IDX = CATE_IDX
ORDER BY G_IDX DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX

SELECT P_NAME,P_IDX,GS_CODE,G_BARCODE,WH_NAME, LOC_TYPE,LOC_CODE,LOC_FORM,LOC_ZONE,location.CREATED_DATE, U_NAME, G_IDX FROM goods LEFT JOIN location ON G_LOC_IDX=LOC_IDX LEFT JOIN warehouse ON LOC_WH_IDX=WH_IDX LEFT JOIN product ON G_P_IDX=P_IDX LEFT JOIN goods_stock on G_GS_IDX=GS_IDX left join user on LOC_U_IDX=U_IDX WHERE G_LOC_IDX IS NOT NULL AND G_STATE='STOCK' and GS_IDX in (SELECT GS_IDX FROM order_gs LEFT JOIN shop_product_option ON SPO_IDX=OG_SPO_IDX LEFT JOIN GOODS_STOCK ON SPO_GS_IDX=GS_IDX LEFT JOIN delivery_num ON OG_DN_IDX=DN_IDX WHERE DN_IDX IS NOT null GROUP BY GS_IDX)
SELECT G_IDX, G_STATE FROM CHECK_GROUP LEFT JOIN CHECK_GOODS ON CG_IDX = CGS_CG_IDX LEFT JOIN GOODS ON CGS_G_IDX = G_IDX WHERE CG_IDX = #{cgIdx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PO LEFT JOIN GOODS ON PO_IDX = G_PO_IDX WHERE PO_IDX = #{po_idx} AND G_POR_IDX IS NULL

SELECT G_IDX, IG_IDX, POR_IDX, PP_IDX, G_STATE, P_NAME, G_BARCODE, G_IMEI, G_SERIAL, P_IDX, G_VENDOR, G_RANK, CATE_SPEC_LIST, IFNULL(CONCAT (G_OPTION ->> '$[0].title', ':', G_OPTION ->> '$[0].values'), '') AS G_OPTION1, IFNULL(CONCAT (G_OPTION ->> '$[1].title', ':', G_OPTION ->> '$[1].values'), '') AS G_OPTION2, IFNULL(CONCAT (G_OPTION ->> '$[2].title', ':', G_OPTION ->> '$[2].values'), '') AS G_OPTION3, G_JSON ->> '$.inSpec2' AS INSPEC2, PN_PROCESS.PN_JSON ->> '$.pSpec1' AS PSPEC1, G_JSON ->> '$.sellSpec2' AS SELLSPEC2, P_OPTION, G_JSON, G_OPTION, PN_PAINT.PN_IDX AS PAINT_PN_IDX, PN_PAINT.PN_CONTENT AS PAINT_CONTENT, PN_PAINT.PN_EXPECTED_COST AS PAINT_COST, PN_PAINT.PN_PROCESS AS PAINT_PROCESS, PN_FIX.PN_IDX AS FIX_PN_IDX, PN_FIX.PN_CONTENT AS FIX_CONTENT, PN_FIX.PN_EXPECTED_COST AS FIX_COST, PN_FIX.PN_PROCESS AS FIX_PROCESS, PN_PROCESS.PN_IDX AS PROCESS_PN_IDX, PN_PROCESS.PN_CONTENT AS PROCESS_CONTENT, PN_PROCESS.PN_EXPECTED_COST AS PROCESS_COST, PN_PROCESS.PN_PROCESS AS PROCESS_PROCESS, IFNULL(PN_PROCESS.PN_JSON, '{}') AS PN_JSON FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN IN_GROUP ON PO_IDX = IG_PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_RECEIVED ON G_POR_IDX = POR_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_PRODUCT ON POR_PP_IDX = PP_IDX LEFT JOIN PROCESS_NEED AS PN_PAINT ON G_IDX = PN_PAINT.PN_G_IDX AND PN_PAINT.PN_TYPE = 'PAINT' AND PN_PAINT.PN_COUNT = 1 LEFT JOIN PROCESS_NEED AS PN_FIX ON G_IDX = PN_FIX.PN_G_IDX AND PN_FIX.PN_TYPE = 'FIX' AND PN_FIX.PN_COUNT = 1 LEFT JOIN PROCESS_NEED AS PN_PROCESS ON G_IDX = PN_PROCESS.PN_G_IDX AND PN_PROCESS.PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND PN_PROCESS.PN_COUNT = 1 LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY ON P_CATE_IDX = CATE_IDX
ORDER BY G_IDX DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN IN_GROUP ON PO_IDX = IG_PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_RECEIVED ON G_POR_IDX = POR_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_PRODUCT ON POR_PP_IDX = PP_IDX LEFT JOIN PROCESS_NEED ON G_IDX = PN_G_IDX AND PN_TYPE = 'PROCESS' AND PN_COUNT = 1 LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX
